glossentry.glossdef: Depending on the context, using 'Context synchronization event' or 'Context synchronization instruction'. One of: ‚Ä¢ Performing an ISB operation. An ISB operation is performed when an ISB instruction is executed and does not fail its condition code check. ‚Ä¢ Taking an exception. ‚Ä¢ Returning from an exception. ‚Ä¢ Exit from Debug state. ‚Ä¢ Executing a DCPS instruction. ‚Ä¢ Executing a DRPS instruction.
